Description: Rim sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; part of lotus flower in faded added white outline with centre in added red; top of rim glazed (worn); exterior: around rim, undetermined pattern, possibly 'Z's above single brown line (mostly worn), reserved below; inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0912) (phase 2)
